title: iSHIFT: Lightweight Slow-Fast GUI Agent with Adaptive Perception
summary: Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) show strong potential for interpreting and interacting with complex, pixel-rich Graphical User Interface (GUI) environments. However, building agents that are both efficient for high-level tasks and precise for fine-grained interactions remains challenging.
